tossup_question: 5) EARTH AND SPACE  In the oceans, waves and surf currents are generated by:
tossup_MCQoptions:

X) El-Nino 
Y) salinity and temperature gradients 
Z) the Intertropical Convergence Zone
bonus_question: 5) EARTH AND SPACE  What is the name for the common ocean waves that are not driven by the wind but sustained by the energy they obtained by the sea?
